data.eml:eml: Review of Empoasca (Matsumurasca) Anufriev (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Empoascini), with description of three new species from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Yang, Qin, Dao-Zheng, Fletcher, Murray J., Zhang, Ya-Lin (2011): Review of Empoasca (Matsumurasca) Anufriev (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Empoascini), with description of three new species from China. Zootaxa 3003: 22-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207054
